column5: Oh baby!!... let the countdown begin!
Looks like dem smallies are livin on the wrong side of da tracks...one's missin a part tail and the other has a shive wound
Looks like dem smallies are livin on the wrong side of da tracks...one's missin a part tail and the other has a shive wound  Bushart.....just like us humans no person is perfect and without blemish!
+1  Can't wait!!!!!
I agree! I'm going after some tomorrow though...South shore of Lake Erie!
Man, I can't wait. Opens Saturday up here!!!
I'm dying here, excited for opener but still dealing with floods  a few pics that get my juices flowing
1000 islands for 3 days, leaving tomorrow 5am, hopefully fishing by 10am
hells yeah
one of the larger catches on Rice.   Simcoe
Just an observation and not to be a buzz kill but...After looking at all the photos there is only one guy wearing a PFD in all those pics! I rarely wear one myself but im just sayin...
I usually wear a auto inflate mustang, on Simcoe i wear a normal PFD. It was 25k that day.
Since most are on shore, they likely figured they were good.......  Cheers  Craig

Just an observation and not to be a buzz kill but...After looking at all the photos there is only one guy wearing a PFD in all those pics! I rarely wear one myself but im just sayin...   Did you also observe the weather/waves in that pic compared to the other ones?  I'm guessing no.
I wear inflatable underwear.
Those are giants!  I'm fishing Erie and niagara river and my biggest around 4lbs.  But they're nothing compared to some of those beauties!!
I wear inflatable underwear.  Does your wife know you took them from her drawer? That was funny PT
I wear inflatable underwear.  Do you have to eat beans the night before to activate??
I wear inflatable underwear.  I hope these are Coast Guard approved  :)
Some pigs from NE Michigan...23" and 20".  Caught 30+ 18" or bigger smallies over the course of 2 days earlier this year.  Headed back in mid July.

Smashed this pig last night while walleye fishing,wading the shallows of the st clair river  We had just made the comment, "cant believe we havent caught a smallmouth or silver yet...only walleye so far, how lucky"  Then this piggy crunched my jig. What a fight in the st clair river current
